name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel H. SEIFRIT, IV, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel H. SEIFRIT, IV, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Berks County is affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Terry L. Parish, Boyertown, for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Reading, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
428 A.2d 1337
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel H. SEIFRIT, IV, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1981.
Decided May 11, 1981.
Terry L. Parish, Boyertown, for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Reading, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
